title: What's the typeface used in this famous ad...
content:
[http://images.ifun.ru/4/4WxRi8HnWF.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018203558/http:/images.ifun.ru/4/4WxRi8HnWF.jpg "http://images.ifun.ru/4/4WxRi8HnWF.jpg")

"Chi mi ama..." Looks so familiar, but im blank

"Hand..."something?
author: Mikhail Kovalev

comments.content:
It's not quite Clearface Gothic.

- Lex

Beat me to it Lex. That was my thought too. Looks like a customized version of the heavy weight of [Clearface Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018203558/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/clearface-gothic/).

- Mike Yanega
I think most guys would want to segua that, if the truth be known.
customized a lot, if its Clearface Gothic....
